title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8130.43 - Town of Verona
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8130.43 - Town of Verona

State Regulations
(a) Route 31
between Route 365 and Main Street, CR 83. (b) Main Street, CR 83, from Route 31
northeasterly for a distance of 0.1+- mile. (c) Route 31 between the Oneida-Madison
county line and Route 46. (d) Route
46 between the Oneida-Madison county line and Route 31. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
